channel.title: Comments for Uniting NC
channel.description: Building Community. Welcoming Immigrants. Uniting North Carolina.

item.title: Comment on The questions that move us forward by Claudette Werleigh
item.dc:creator: Claudette Werleigh
item.description: I had heard about Mount Olive but I had not read the facts until now. It's so refreshing !
item.content:encoded: I had heard about Mount Olive but I had not read the facts until now. It’s so refreshing !

item.title: Comment on Billboard: A Call for Immigrants to be Welcomed by What Now? Moving Forward from a Divisive Election Season – Envested

item.description: […] NC works with immigrants and has already responded to some of the targeted hate from this election […]

item.title: Comment on Thank you Francisco! by Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: Francisco, your work with Uniting NC will be greatly missed. Best of luck!
item.content:encoded: Francisco, your work with Uniting NC will be greatly missed. Best of luck!

item.title: Comment on N&O Story Highlights Immigrants’ Generosity by Kelly
item.dc:creator: Kelly
item.description: Terrific pictures! So glad to see refugees, immigrants, and native-born North Carolinians working together to make the Triangle a great place to live!
item.content:encoded: Terrific pictures! So glad to see refugees, immigrants, and native-born North Carolinians working together to make the Triangle a great place to live!

item.title: Comment on Immigrants, Old and New, Work Together to Help Our Community by Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description: What an amazing day - thanks for organizing it, Uniting NC. We need more examples like this for how people from different backgrounds can work together to improve our communities.
item.content:encoded: What an amazing day – thanks for organizing it, Uniting NC. We need more examples like this for how people from different backgrounds can work together to improve our communities.
